page.title: 17ROUNDABOUTS
page.content: If we stand on a round-about more cars will pass than being on a leading off road. If we stand on one side of the road we cannot see the cars going up the other way, so we should have partners to see the other side. Also we will have another on our side to catch the registratoins if we miss them. If we go out at different times of the day we will get different answers, so the time we go out at 11.00 a.m._ 12.00 a.m. will be buisier than 3.30 p.m. in the afternoon because of rush hour traffic. I think we should go out for 15- minutes so that gives us enough time to survey the cars. Also to go out more than once and at different time of the year.
